title: Cubbies Cookin; Vlad, Jr. Breakthrough; Brenly Durag Comment Controversy, Betting on the Bases -- MLB Insider J.P. Morosi
itunes:title: Cubbies Cookin; Vlad, Jr. Breakthrough; Brenly Durag Comment Controversy, Betting on the Bases -- MLB Insider J.P. Morosi
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob discusses the red hot Cubbies winning 9 of 10, Vladimir Guerrero, Jr.'s MVP caliber start to the year, and Diamondbacks announcer Bob Brenly stepping into a controversy with comments about Mets pitcher Marcus Stroman's durag. Also, Betting on the Bases, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Diamond Dust.

Guest: NBA Champion Eddie House discusses young star swag and if his hometown A's can finally break through this year. Fox Sports MLB Insider JP Morosi breaks down the surprising Rays, other division races, and the Dodgers picking up Albert Pujols,

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
